Detailed Description

Interface used to tokenize a gTextStream.

This struct contains the parameters, text stream, and flags. It also is responsible for managing the token cache (see: gGetToken, and gClearTCache) These structs should really only be created with gCreateTokenStream and freed with gFreeTokenStream.

See also:
gtokenize.h::gCreateTokenStream, gtokenize.h::gFreeTokenStream, gtokenize.h::gResetTokenStream, gtokenize.h::gGetNextToken, gtokenize.h::gGetToken, gtokenize.h::gClearTCache
